name: Easter Eggztravaganza
description: Everywhere in this amazing Easter Wonderland is crammed full of Easter Eggs, Bunnies, Candy and Fabulous Toys. Mom takes Mike and Sally to get fresh laid eggs from the Farm, then they they come home to paint them. Meanwhile, the Easter Bunny runs past and leaves eggs all over the backyard for them to find. Next, the family go downtown to the Shopping Mall, then visit Auntie Janet’s house, before going to the nearby Church for the ultimate Mega Easter Egg Hunt. Play captivating mini games such as spot-the-difference, jigsaw puzzles and many more in an Easter Eggztravaganza for all the family to enjoy..
